page.title: 06FRANKTON FARMS
page.content: IN{FRANKTON}THERE ARE SIX FARMS. THERE IS{MANOR FARM, HIGHFIELD FARM, {BOTTOM FARM FIRS FARM, POOLS FARM {AND ELM FARM. FIRS FARM}HAS BEEN THERE FOR ABOUT A{HUNDRED YEARS.}THIS FARM IS A POTATO FARM. MITCHELLS WHO OWN {FIRS FARM}HAVE BOUGHT UP MANY OF THE FARMS AND FARMLAND AROUND FRANKTON. {HIGHFIELD FARM}HAS BEEF CATTLE AND CROPS.{BOTTOM FARM}HAS BEEF CATTLE. {MANOR FARM}HAS SHEEP AND SOME CROPS. {ELM FARM}JUST HAS A HOUSE NOW.{POOLS {FARM}HAS SHEEP, CATTLE AND SOME CROPS.MITCHELLS OWN THREE OF THE FARMS, PRICES OWN TWO FARMS, PADGETS OWN ONE FARM. THE MAIN CROPS ARE RAPE, BARLEY AND WHEAT.
